long_description: The lightweight, scrunchable Patagonia Trim Brim Hat protects your boy's tender scalp, ears and face from the sun. Supplex(R) nylon fabric with a durable water repellent finish is lightweight, dries fast and packs down small. Fabric provides UPF 40 sun protection. The Patagonia Trim Brim Hat features a custom adjustment cinch on the crown and a non-chafing chin strap with soft lock adjustment; chin strap can be tucked out of the way. Reinforced front brim retains shape when wet; circular brim better shields head and neck. 4 ventilation holes release heat on hot summer days.
short_description: The lightweight, scrunchable Patagonia Trim Brim Hat protects your boy's tender scalp, ears and face from the sun.
